document_data.mainbody:
ook Alley was a small alley that was located in the city of Waterdeep.
Rook Alley was located in the north section of Waterdeeps Sea Ward. It branched off of the southern end of Kulzars Alley, passing through a small neighborhood in between Heroes Walk and the Fanebar.
The alley earned its name as it was the headquarters of an infamous thief called the Rook.
